channel.title: New king ability "Long day"
channel.description:
One of the thing that annoy me the most is that in alot of games you don't have the time to make the right decision such as who to vote out in the critical rounds of 3-9 players
When you don't execute on those rounds, alot of time you lose the majority of blue dragon and the game.
Anyone who plays Mafia, resistance or werewolf know how hard it to find a bad guy from a group of people that you can actully see, so guessing with 1 minute is almost impossible,
My suggestion, add a new option for the king for a long day,like 2-3 minutes longer, few charges, can only used when there are 10 or less players.
Then players will be able to use their brain and make the right decision, and not a random decision.
